ObjectClass.Name: Scout Light-Marine
ObjectClass.Description:
SCOUT (LIGHT-MARINE): Cloaking light foot skirmisher Minimal armor; powerful splash attack Devastating in and vs large groups
Cloaks when not attacking Can fire limited high damage RPGs while cloaked (upgradable: Ground Tech) Builds basic structures

Objective.Name: Move
Objective.Details: \Move to specified location\ \Move Speed: 2.25, MaxInc: 45\Vision Radius: 23, Aggro Range: 30

Objective.Name: Attack
Objective.Details: Attack specified target or enemies spotted\ en route to specified location\[Weapons Avg Damage/10secs ]\G: 27 (+106), R 20, SR 3, F 25%\A: 27 (+106), R 20, SR 3, F 25%

Objective.Name: Patrol
Objective.Details: Hold CTRL and select up to 5 points to\continuously patrol around\Target one of your own units to HOLD\current position or select a single\location to HOLD that position

Objective.Name: Change Commander
Objective.Details: \Set this unit's commander\ \Alt-Right-Click on unit to\select its current commander

Objective.Name: Remove from Hierarchy
Objective.Details: \Remove unit from hierarchy\to disconnect from commander\and all subordinates

Objective.Name: Priority
Objective.Details: \While Moving or Attacking,\subordinates will break formation\and move at their top speeds

Objective.Name: Build
Objective.Details: \Select a building to create:\ \RP, IMPORTER, ARMORY,\FACTORY, COMM CENTER

Objective.Name: Ride in a Tank
Objective.Details: \Hitch a ride on the closest tank

Objective.Name: Stop
Objective.Details: \Interrupt current objective\and return to idling

Objective.Name: Resource Processor
Objective.Details: - place near resource crates\Small building\processes L-Crystals and Q-Plasma\Converts Q-P into L-C\Can move itslef

Objective.Name: Importer
Objective.Details: Medium building\Imports RESERVE SOLDIERS\ RESERVE SOLDIERS are deployed\ automatically to drive or\ pilot the vehicles you build

Objective.Name: Factory
Objective.Details: Medium building\produces the following units:\MECH, ATHC, LANCER, TANK,\TORNADE

Objective.Name: Armory
Objective.Details: Medium building\performs tech tree upgrades\produces the following units:\MARINE, SPECIAL OP

Objective.Name: Comm Center
Objective.Details: Small building\Extra wide visibilty radius\Toggles:\ Auto-heirarchy and smart-idle\Allows MECHs to build CARRIERs

Objective.Name: Chronoport
Objective.Details: \Chronoport to a specified time\ Must be near a Chronoporter\ Must not have a TSS

Objective.Name: Chronoport
Objective.Details: Not Available\ Requires the Gate Tech\ upgrade at the ARMORY

Objective.Name: Teleport
Objective.Details: \Teleport to a specified location\ Must be near a Teleporter

Objective.Details: \Chronoport to a specified time\ Must be near a Chronoporter

Objective.Details: Small building\Automatically Teleports idle units to a \preset location within a short distance\Can move itself

Objective.Details: Medium building\Allows units to Teleport to any\location within a medium distance

Objective.Details: Large building\Produces the following units:\MAR, FRIGATE, MFB, BLACKBIRD,\HEAY CRUISER\Equips HEAVY CRUISER with nukes

Objective.Details: Fast air mechanical armor\Repairs mechanical units\Cloaks\[ Weapon ] Ground: 56 Air: 56

Objective.Details: Not Available \ Requires the Machinery\ upgrade at the ARMORY

Objective.Details: Medium speed ground mechanical vehicle\Strong against ground targets\Can merge with another MAR\no anti-air weapon\[ Weapon ] Ground: 73 Air: 0

Objective.Name: Equip Nuke
Objective.Details: Not Available \ Requires the Aerospace\ upgrade at the ARMORY

ObjectClass.Name: Armory
ObjectClass.Description:
ARMORY:
Performs tech tree upgrades
Produces the following units: MARINE, SPECIAL OP

Objective.Name: Create Marines
Objective.Details: Slow ground biological foot soldier\Builds basic structures\Powerful in large groups\Splash damage weapon (upgradable)\[ Weapon ] Ground: 55 (+13) Air: 55 (+13)

Objective.Name: Create SOPs
Objective.Details: Slow ground biological foot soldier\Detects cloaked units\Heals biological units\Clears nanite infection\[ Weapon ] Ground: 86 Air: 31

Objective.Name: Congregate Troops At
Objective.Details: \Set congregation point for\deployed troops

Objective.Name: Clear Congregation Point
Objective.Details: \Clear congregation point for\deployed troops

Objective.Name: Upgrade Machinery
Objective.Details: \Enable building heavy vehicles\and Turrets

Objective.Name: Upgrade Ground Units
Objective.Details: \Upgrades MARINE and MECH weapons\Allows TURRET weapon upgrade\Allows the HEAVY TANK upgrade\Allows two MARs to merge

Objective.Name: Upgrade Specials
Objective.Details: \Enables special abilities:\ TSS and Nanite Infect

Objective.Name: Upgrade Gate Tech
Objective.Details: \Allows MECHs to build:\ Teleporters, Chronoporters and\ Slingshots

Objective.Name: Upgrade Aerospace
Objective.Details: \Upgrades LANCER and TORNADE\weapons\Allows nukes for HEAVY CRUISERS

Objective.Name: Upgrade Aerospace
Objective.Details: \Upgrade Aerospace\ Not available\ Requires the Machinery upgrade

ObjectClass.Name: Comm Center (Off)
ObjectClass.Description:
COMMUNICATIONS CENTER:
Toggles: Auto-heirarchy and smart-idle

Objective.Name: Move
Objective.Details: \Move to specified location

Objective.Name: Activate
Objective.Details: \Plant on the ground and activate

ObjectClass.Name: Comm Center
ObjectClass.Description:
COMMUNICATIONS CENTER:
Extra wide visibilty radius Cloaked Toggles: Auto-heirarchy and smart-idle

Objective.Name: Turn Auto Hierarchy ON
Objective.Details: \Enable Automatic Hierarchy\Makes units find higher ranked\commanders by proximity

Objective.Name: Turn Smart Idle ON
Objective.Details: \Enable auto-communication\Make units automatically request\and respond when help is needed\ Heal, Repair, Recover and Find

Objective.Name: Turn Auto Hierarchy OFF
Objective.Details: \Disable Automatic Hierarchy

Objective.Name: Turn Smart Idle OFF
Objective.Details: \Disable auto-communication

Objective.Name: Relocate
Objective.Details: Deactivate this Comm Center\to move to specified location

IMPORTER:
Imports RESERVE SOLDIERS
RESERVE SOLDIERS are deployed automatically to drive or pilot the vehicles you build

ObjectClass.Name: Chronoporter

CHRONOPORTER:
Transports units through time Creates TSS (Temporal Solition Shields)

Objective.Name: Temporal Soliton Shield
Objective.Details: Not Available \ Requires the Specials\ upgrade at the ARMORY

Objective.Name: Temporal Soliton Shield
Objective.Details: \Create a TSS field on target\ \Make target invulnerable

ObjectClass.Name: Slingshot
ObjectClass.Description:
SLINGSHOT:
Teleports units to a preset location within a short distance
Can move itself

Objective.Name: Idle
Objective.Details: \Disable Auto Mode\Turn virtual bridge off

Objective.Name: Move
Objective.Details: \Move to specified location\ \Slingshot is disabled

Objective.Name: Stop
Objective.Details: \Plant on the ground

Objective.Name: Auto Slingshot
Objective.Details: Enable bridge mode\Auto-Teleport nearby units to a\preset location within a short distance\

ObjectClass.Name: Teleporter
ObjectClass.Description:
TELEPORTER:
Teleports units to any location within a medium distance

Objective.Name: Idle
Objective.Details: Teleporter Gate\Regular operation mode\ \Teleport units to destination

ObjectClass.Name: Industrial Teleporter
ObjectClass.Description:
INDUSTRIAL TELEPORTER:
Teleports units to any location within a significant distance

Objective.Name: Idle
Objective.Details: Teleporter Gate\Regular operation mode\ \Teleport units to destination

ObjectClass.Name: Resource Processor
ObjectClass.Description:
RESOURCE PROCESSOR (RP):
Processes materials: L-Crystals and Q-Plasma
Can convert Q-P into L-C
Can move itself

Objective.Name: Process Resource
Objective.Details: \Process L-Crystal or Q-Plasma\ \For best efficiency limit to 1 RP\ per crate

Objective.Name: Relocate
Objective.Details: \Interrupt processing to move

Objective.Name: QPlasma -> LCrystal
Objective.Details: \Interrupt processing to convert\40 Q-Plasma to 20 L-Crystal

Objective.Name: Teleport
Objective.Details: \Teleport to a specified location\ Must be near a Teleporter\ \Will interrupt processing

Processes materials: L-Crystals and Q-Plasma Can convert Q-P into L-C Can move itself

Objective.Details: \Cconvert:\40 Q-Plasma to 20 L-Crystal

Objective.Name: Teleport
Objective.Details: \Teleport to a specified location\ Must be near a Teleporter

Objective.Name: Change Commander
Objective.Details: \Set this unit's commander\ \Alt-Right-Click on unit to\select its current commander

Objective.Name: Remove from Hierarchy
Objective.Details: \Remove unit from hierarchy\to disconnect from commander\and all subordinates

Objective.Name: Priority
Objective.Details: \While Moving or Attacking,\subordinates will break formation\and move at their top speeds

Objective.Name: Load Unit
Objective.Details: Loads target unit into carrier\for transport and repair

Objective.Name: Release Cargo
Objective.Details: Release All at location

Objective.Name: Stop
Objective.Details: \Interrupt current objective\and return to idling

Objective.Name: Release Unit
Objective.Details: Select a Carried Unit
